message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. Let's find a middle ground.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still not able to meet at $9,250. I am willing to pay up to $9,100 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
